Instantly.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT! VORTEX CONNECTED TO THE CHAT @channel

I barely have any tools, my node NetMap is corrupted and unusable right now

Yeah, cops didn't know that I was inside their systems, used accounts of some fat guy Paul, a clerk in CyberPolice
Wow, nice moves man, fuck'em

Dunno, I read instructions from that clerk's emails
It said that police copies have that log-disguising function
How could you operate so close with cops, get police copy of OS way before everyone got regular Hacknet on deepweb, and get fucked from someone, so that you lost your tools and map?
There is always bigger fish, don't ever get cocky
Hmm, it's still suspicious to me that you got all that police-exclusive tools, how can I be sure that you are not undercover pig?
How many undercover pigs go to the script kiddies message boards and troll them?

Fine, sounds reasonable

Really?
Not free of course
Need something done first
Interested?
Depends on what you want me to do
Don't worry, nothing serious, I need to ruin a life of one guy
Sounds like a fucking serious matter if you ask me
I'll do the main part, you just have to poke around and find some dirt I can use
Or make him dirty in some way
Who is he?
He is a cop
Not big one, few years back got promoted to detective, was a patrolman before
My detention made him a noble cop of a neighborhood
Packed me up because of a gun selling activity
My partners thought that I gonna snitch on them and tried to cut my throat, unsuccessful though
Not to mention a couple of violent faggots who tried to taste my ass
I was nearly raped and killed, while this pig basked in the glory of all local newspapers and other folks
A man in your position should understand how that need of revenge feels
See? We both have same goal
Help me to revenge this ass-licker and I help you to revenge that cocksucker you are talking about
